posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 文章发布
posts.text: 创建一篇新的文章方式一：指令 1$ hexo new "Name" 方式二：Typora新建文件 发布测试生成界面 1$ hexo g 生成服务器 1$ hexo s 简要代码 1$ hexo g;hexo s 本地测试链接 上传更新1$ hexo d HEXO文档链接：https://hexo.io/docs

posts.title: 博客主题更换
posts.text: ICARUS安装12$ npm install hexo-theme-icarus$ hexo config theme icarus 自定义内容参考文档：Icarus快速上手 - Icarus (ppoffice.github.io) Icarus4主题自定义记录 | BlakeNeko的博客 导航栏改动12345678910111213141516navbar: # 左上角的常驻导航栏 menu: 主页: / 时间线: /archives 分类: /categories 标签: /tags 关于: /about # 右上角常驻链接 links: # 显示信息 GitHub: # 图标 icon: fab fa-github # 链接 url: https://github.com/CN-Frost
